-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A simple quasiquoter to include sass code in yesod
--   
--   This is a simple quasiquoter to include sass code in yesod. You can
--   use wsass to create a widget in the same way as lucius.
@package yesod-sass
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | In this module there is a helper function called <a>wsass'</a>. You
--   need to use it to define another function using <a>wsass'</a> passing
--   in the first argument the path to be used to resolve @include like
--   this:
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; let wsass = wass' "sass_include/"
--   </pre>
--   
--   Please, check the install instructions of hlibsass at
--   <a>https://github.com/jakubfijalkowski/hlibsass</a>
module Text.Sass.QQ

-- | Quasiquoter that generate a string from Sass code
sass :: QuasiQuoter

-- | Quasiquoter that generate a yesod widget from Sass code
wsass' :: FilePath -> QuasiQuoter
